Schackmatt
Published

October 15, 2025

V.42 2025

Då var det onsdag och dags för veckobladet i vanlig ordning. denna veckan fick vi en uppdatering till måndagen istället för till onsdagen.

Vi har haft ett officermöte och lite detaljer ifrån det tar vi mot slutet.

Changelog

  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  •  
  • Palefur Cloak, Stoutheart Shawl and Verix’ Navigator Cloak are now correctly enchantable.
  • Fixed an issue where Magnetic Band could not be disenchanted.
  • Fixed an issue with Demon Hair Bow interacting with quivers.
  • Master Strike (Mace) disorient effect is now cancelled by damage as intended.
  • Fixed an issue where Echo of Medivh sometimes dropped only one item.
  • Reduced damage of Wobblefree Fizz‑rifle.
  • Fixed Arctiras using Frost Nova too often.
  • Quest Saving the Shadowtooth will now show its rewards.
  • Corrected drop rate for Iron Pommel.
  • Fixed duplicate‑item issues with the Beached Sea Creature and Sea Turtle quests.
  • Erennius should now always stop attacking after Solnius dies.
  • It is no longer possible for multiple Razormane Pathfinders to spawn from the quest item.
  • Enhancing Winds now properly increases block amount.
  • Adjusted armor values of numerous NPCs in new dungeons and extensions.
  • Fixed Magicspark Leggings losing their effect upon entering the Blood Ring.
  • Jarg’ukk can now repair your items.
  • Concoction of the Emerald Mongoose now grants healing power and spell crit as well.
  • Fixed incorrect disenchant loot for Grim Reaches quest rewards.
  • You can no longer use the appearance of quest items such as Egan’s Blaster for transmogrification.
  • Anubisath Warders now select only two crowd‑control types instead of all possible ones.
  • Cloudplate Wristguards armor increased from 246 to 346.
  • Azure Silk Hood: Increased Intellect from 7 → 8, added 7 Frost Spellpower.
  • Fixed an issue that caused Shield of Baggoth to have more block and less armor than intended.
  • Changed several relics to be unique, matching other relics.
  • Added missing 10 Arcane Resistance to Judgement Leggings and Judgement Legguards.
  • Added missing 10 Frost Resistance to Judgement Helmet and Judgement Crown.
  • Added missing 10 Fire Resistance to Judgement Chestguard and Judgement Chestplate.
  • Added a 10‑minute cooldown to Shadow‑Weaver’s Cape slow‑fall effect.
  • Fixed the Rune‑Etched item set not granting its set bonuses.
  • Fixed sheathing for Spire of Channeled Power.
  • Horn of Engryss: removed on‑use Thorns effect, increased armor from 15 → 30, added 8 Stamina and 3 Nature Damage Thorns effect.
  • Jadestone Protector: replaced 3 % Resilience with 1 % Block Chance, increased Defense from 8 → 9.
  • Thunder Brew Special Reserve no longer disappears after some time.
  • Changed Darnassus Sentinel Glaive’s weapon type to One‑Handed Sword.
  • Half Eaten Mutton Chop is now a One‑Handed Mace, allowing transmogrification.
  • Slightly reduced Stormreaver Fang’s sell price.
  • Rufus’ Trusty Tankard: reduced DPS from 31.7 → 25.6, reduced Stamina from 8 → 6. Updated disenchant output.
  • Kinrial’s Scalpel: reduced DPS from 31.6 → 25.6, reduced Strength from 8 → 6, reduced Agility from 7 → 5. Updated disenchant output.
  • Noppsy’s Compendium: reduced Intellect from 8 → 6. Updated disenchant output.
  • Nippsy’s Precision Rifle: reduced DPS from 24.7 → 20.7, reduced Agility from 6 → 4, reduced Intellect from 5 → 4. Updated disenchant output.
  • Ionized Metal Grips: reduced Armor from 152 → 147, reduced Stamina from 6 → 4.
  • Fixed a name typo for Northwind Guard Breaches.
  • Fixed an issue where Legacki could become stuck.
  • Fixed an issue where Poisonous Mushroom dealt more damage than intended.
  • Removed unused Davingrad’s Camp from the Cartographer achievement requirement.
  • In‑game messages that were previously English‑only can now be localized.
  • Varimathras will no longer attack players during the quest To Catch a Rat.
  • Dark Rider summoned during the quest Scythe of the Goddess will now despawn when combat ends.
  • Gloves of Unwinding Mystery: Spellpower lowered from 22 → 9.
  • The mailbox has been added to Dun Kithas.
  • Players can now acquire another Orphan Whistle if the original is lost while completing the Children’s Week questline.
  • Torble Sparksprocket and all associated quests have been removed.
  • Hardcore players can no longer earn XP inside battlegrounds.
  • Whirlwind can now trigger weapon procs.
  • Deep Wounds has been fixed to deal the intended amount of damage.
  • Critical damage from Coordinated Assault can now enable the ability Baited Shot.

Avslut

  • Huvudräder ändrad tid: 20:00-22:00 (start 16:e Oktober)
  • Eventuellt att vi drar någon minut extra efter 22:00 om vi tar en paus vid 21:00 mellan våra elixir.
  • Avvakta med 2h buffar till vi är vid första bossen. ;D

Glöm inte bort att vi justerat rädtiderna nu. Eventuellt att vi drar någon minut extra efter 22:00 om vi tar en paus vid 21:00 mellan våra elixir. Avvakta med 2h buffar till vi är vid första bossen. ;D
